Fludiazepam, nke a na-ere n'okpuru aha Erispan (エリスパン) bụ benzodiazepine dị ike na 2ʹfluoro sitere na diazepam, bụ nke Hoffman-La Roche mepụtara na 1960s. A na-ere ya na Japan na Taiwan

[mkpa nhota] Ọ na-arụ ọrụ ọgwụ ya site na ịkwalite mgbochi GABAergic. Fludiazepam nwere okpukpu anọ karịa njikọ maka ndị na-anabata benzodiazepine karịa diazepam. Ọ nwere ihe na-eme ndị mmadụ n'ihe ndị na em ka nchegbu kwụsị, ihe na-egbochi nkụchi, ihe na'ime ka ahụ dị jụụ, ihe na na-emebi ihe na-emetụta ahụike. A na-eji Fludiazepam eme ihe ntụrụndụ.
